summary: This document appears to be a due diligence report conducted by PWM BIS-RESEARCH, detailing the results of searches performed on a subject's name for compliance purposes. The report indicates that there were no significant negative media results or court cases found, and it includes instructions for further actions required by the client.

persons.name: Prichi Pawa
persons.context: Prichi Pawa is identified as the research analyst who prepared the due diligence report.

persons.name: Massimiliano Giornetti
persons.context: Massimiliano Giornetti is mentioned in relation to the launch of a new handbag by Salvatore Ferragamo, discussing its design and significance.

persons.name: Fiamma Ferragamo
persons.context: Fiamma Ferragamo is referenced as the late designer whose legacy is honored by the new handbag design.

keyFacts: The document is a due diligence report dated January 30, 2017.
No significant negative media results or court cases were found for the subject of the report.
Prichi Pawa is the research analyst who prepared the report.
Massimiliano Giornetti discusses the new Fiamma handbag by Salvatore Ferragamo.
Fiamma Ferragamo is recognized for her contributions to the Ferragamo brand and her legacy.
